tool.name: libraries
tool.command:
parsec libraries upload_file_from_url "$library_id" "$file_url"
#if $folder_id: --folder_id "$folder_id" #end if #if $file_type: --file_type "$file_type" #end if #if $dbkey: --dbkey "$dbkey" #end if
| jq -S . > $results

param.name: library_id
param.label: Library Id
param.help: id of the library where to place the uploaded file

param.name: file_url
param.label: File Url
param.help: URL of the file to upload

param.name: folder_id
param.label: Folder Id
param.help: id of the folder where to place the uploaded file. If not provided, the root folder will be used

tool.help: Upload a file to a library from a URL.
